headline: New Willis survey highlights changing global trends in cyber risk strategy for directors and officers
summary: LONDON, July 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Data loss and cyber-attacks were identified as two of the top three risks to directors and officers, according to the latest Cyber Directors’ and Officers’ Survey Report by Willis, a WTW business, (NASDAQ:WTW). The survey gathered responses from a range of sectors, including the services sector (24%) and finance and insurance (19%), with more than half representing for-profit, private companies.
